title: Live Mock Draft! (08/19 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Donate to St. Jude as part of our Draft-A-Thon! Bid on pre-draft calls with our experts, a spot in our Podcast League, a guest spot on our show and more! https://ebay.to/3p4Dc3Z
Check out the draft results here: https://www.cbssports.com/fantasy/football/news/fantasy-football-ppr-mock-draft-javonte-williams-dameon-pierce-george-pickens-on-the-rise-in-listener-draft/
Follow along for our live mock draft! It's 12 teams, 2-WRs, full PPR and we've got nine listeners drafting with Heath, Dave and Jamey. When did Dameon Pierce and George Pickens get drafted? What key trend did we notice with running backs vs. wide receivers? ... Recapping Rounds 1 and 2 (10:23) including Javonte Williams going in the middle of the second round. We also talk about Tom Brady's timeline (18:50) and how that should affect how you draft Bucs WRs. Then we recap Rounds 3 and 4 (23:30) ... Recapping Rounds 5 and 6 (40:40) and then Rounds 7 and 8 (56:50). You definitely see better WR value at one point, but when does that end? And we finish with Rounds 9-13 (1:00:00) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs
Follow the brand new FFT TikTok account: https://www.tiktok.com/@fftoday
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/fantasyfootballtoday
Get 20% off Fantasy Football Today merch: https://store.cbssports.com/collections/fantasy-football-today%20?utm_source=podcast-apple-com&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=buy-our-merch&utm_content=fantasy-football-collection
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
You can listen to Fantasy Football Today on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast."
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
